createKey.title: Create new key
createKey.description: Some orgnanization or service asks you to create a new crypto key
createKey.unknown-reason: Be cautious! We do not know why you are asked to create a new key.

sign.title: Sign with the key
sign.description: Some service asks you to sign a document with your key
sign.unknown-reason: Be cautious! We do not know why you are asked to make this signature.

masterSign.title: Sign with the primary key
masterSign.description: Some service asks you to sign a document with your primary key, that most likely should be used only with OwlMeans services
masterSign.unknown-reason: Be cautious! We do not know why you are asked to make this signature.

getMasterDid.title: Get your primary DID
getMasterDid.description: Some service asks for your primary decentralized address, that most likely should be shared only with OwlMeans services
getMasterDid.unknown-reason: Be cautious! We do not know why you are asked to share your primary DID.

selectKey.title: Choose a key
selectKey.description: Some service asks you to choose a key to get its public detials
selectKey.unknown-reason: Be cautious! We do not know why you are asked to provide public info of one of your keys.

getPublicDetails.title: Get public key
getPublicDetails.description: Some service asks for a public key linked to your organization profile
getPublicDetails.unknown-reason: Be cautious! We do not know why you are asked to share your public key.

requestPermissions.title: Requested permissions
requestPermissions.description: Some service asks to perform an action sequence with your wallet
requestPermissions.unknown-reason: Be cautious! We do not know why you are asked to perform these actions.

method.sign: Sign some data with your key
method.masterSign: Sign data with your primary key
method.selectKey: Get one of your public keys
